Welcome to CU Pride, Cardiff University's LGBT+ Society! Weâ€™re one of the most active societies across the University. 

We welcome everyone regardless of Gender Identity or Sexual Orientation and pride ourselves on being an all-inclusive society. Discrimination against any protected characteristics will not be tolerated. We hope that you have a great year with the society!
We don't have a specific day, but specific date and times for socials we run can be found on our SU page and our social media.

Our membership is free! 

We also offer a plus card/premium membership with benefits for the Pulse nightclub!

We host multiple socials a week and a variety of different events - drinking and non-drinking, day time and night time, on and off the gay scene and on different days throughout the week. There is something for everyone!
